Sprints

Find out more about each of our three sprints!

Previous

Next

  • 1
Sprint 2

Goal of Sprint 2

The goal of our second sprint was to integrate a mechanism which allowed us to add a strip of seaweed to the device, and incorporate the required food safety considerations after receiving feedback on this in our last sprint review.

Read more

Published: Nov 15, 2023

Sprint 1

Goal of Sprint 1

For our first sprint, our goal was to create a device that could compact something into a triangle. We used Play-Doh for testing at this phase. We had defined goals for each of the mechanical, software, and electrical components, although at this stage our work was mostly on the mechanical side of things.

Read more

Published: Nov 2, 2023
